body_html:
He did talk about compiling C++ standalone shared-lib on Windows and he did uploaded one for TF1.8

The discussion: fo40225/tensorflow-windows-wheel#6
The TF1.8 C++ standalone shared-lib: https://github.com/fo40225/tensorflow-windows-wheel/tree/master/1.8.0/cpp

Hope this information can help you as I have no idea how to do that

body:
He did talk about compiling C++ standalone shared-lib on Windows and he did uploaded one for TF1.8

The discussion: https://github.com/fo40225/tensorflow-windows-wheel/issues/6
The TF1.8 C++ standalone shared-lib: https://github.com/fo40225/tensorflow-windows-wheel/tree/master/1.8.0/cpp

Hope this information can help you as I have no idea how to do that
